title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? Crypto prices are unlikely to see a major recovery without new or returning investors bringing cash back into the market. Unless the retail people enter the market, Ethereum won’t strongly blast above ATH. Maybe something sparks retail, though, like Coinbase, ... Read more

title: Dollar Duck: A Revolutionary Play-to-Earn Gaming Platform with Generous Rewards for Early Adopters
description:
Dollar Duck is a revolutionary Play-to-Earn gaming platform that combines web3 gaming with the power of memes, offering generous rewards for early adopters. The project emphasizes transparency, with no hidden features in the Smart Contract, and allows the community to shape the project’s direction. Early adopters receive exclusive benefits, including extra rewards and early access [...]

title: Bitcoin Is a 10x Better Bet Than JPMorgan Stock, Says Multiple Billionaire Mike Novogratz
description:

title: US Banking System Will Lose Massive Chunks of Wealth From American Businesses Seeking Yield: Arthur Hayes
description:
BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes says that US banks are about to take another hit, this time from businesses looking to outperform low interest rates. Writing in a new essay, Hayes says that the recent “exodus” out of the US banking system will likely get worse. According to statistics compiled by the Federal Reserve Economic Data […]
